name: Ghost: DroneSync
description:
(This was created as an entry for the 7-Day Roguelike Challenge 2022)

The Situation

Take on the role of legendary mercenary, code-named "Ghost", as you infiltrate heavily fortified complexes and complete mission objectives. Use your skills and tools to get in and out without being noticed. 

Your standard toolkit comes with:

  • a drone, for remote reconnaissance,
  • smoke-bombs to disorient foes and create cover and,
  • a coin for distraction

You might pick up more equipment on-site. Time to move out.

Controls:
  • Arrow Keys or WASD or HJKL - Move character or drone, or targeting reticle .
  • Tab  - swap between you and drone (if deployed)
  • Space Bar - Rest
  • Enter/Space - Confirm targeting actions.
  • I - Open inventory.
    • Numbers or clicking will activate items. You can also use Shift+Numpad #
  • O - Open log

Bumping into guards will stun them for a short period. You can walk over stunned enemies.
